pages.title: Parties
pages.text: When playing multiplayer, you can create or join a party with friends. While in the same party, your spells will not damage your teammates.$(br2)Commands for party management:$(br)$(list)Create party:$(br)  $(copy:/openpac-parties create)/openpac-parties create$()$(br)$(list)Disband party:$(br)  $(copy:/openpac-parties destroy confirm)/openpac-parties destroy $(br)   confirm$()

$(list)Leave party:$(br)  $(copy:/openpac-parties leave)/openpac-parties leave$()$(br)$(list)Invite player:$(br)  $(copy:/openpac-parties member invite )/openpac-parties member $(br)   invite <player id>$()$(br)$(list)Kick player:$(br)  $(copy:/openpac-parties member kick )/openpac-parties member $(br)   kick <player id>$()$(br)$(list)Join party:$(br)  $(copy:/openpac-parties join )/openpac-parties join <id>$()
